refnamediv.refpurpose: Dumps the internal XML tree back into a string

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Creates an XML document from the dom representation. This function is usually called after building a new dom document from scratch as in the example below. The node is used to output only the node rather than the entire document.

example.title: Creating a simple HTML document header
example.programlisting:
createElement("HTML"); $root = $doc->appendChild($root); $head = $doc->createElement("HEAD"); $head = $root->appendChild($head); $title = $doc->createElement("TITLE"); $title = $head->appendChild($title); $text = $doc->createTextNode("This is the title"); $text = $title->appendChild($text); echo "
";
echo htmlentities($doc->saveXML());
echo "
"; ?>

refsect1.para: See also DOMDocument->load(), DOMDocument->loadXML() and DOMDocument->save().
